    • Method Detail

      • isAllowed

        public boolean isAllowed(GenericExecutor commandSender)
        check if the sender has permissions to execute this command. you do not need to run this check itself, its used by the framework.
        Parameters:
        commandSender - Command sender
        Returns:
        true if the player is allowed to execute a command

      • onExecute

        public abstract void onExecute(GenericExecutor sender,
                               java.lang.String[] args)
        Parameters:
        sender - the sender that executed the commands
        args - the arguments after your command, starting at index 0
